importFromXml

public void importFromXml(java.lang.String xml)
Description copied from interface: AdCategoryService
Import categories from the given xml string, creating a new category hierarchy. The expected format is: 
 <ad-categories>
     <ad-category name="...">
         <ad-category name="..." />
         <ad-category name="..." />
     </ad-category>
     <ad-category name="...">
         <ad-category name="...">
            <ad-category name="..." />
            <ad-category name="..." />
         </ad-category>
         <ad-category name="..." />
         <ad-category name="..." />
         <ad-category name="..." />
     </ad-category>
 </ad-categories>

Specified by:
importFromXml in interface AdCategoryService
